maxNumberPlots.description: Maximum number of sensor plots Joule can show on a line chart.

defaultChart.description: Default chart type to be shown on startup [line, sankey, treeMap]

autoFilter.description: Object to specifiy max power values before auto discarding data outside limits.

zeroDate.description: The initial date at which data becomes available

treeUrl.description: URL of the JSON file that defines tree to use.

sensorRootUrl.description: URL of the root of the dir structure containing the sensor data.

carbonRootUrl.description: URL prefix of the carbon data.
